thread.title: 1 dead, 3 wounded in NAU campus shooting
thread.title_full: 1 dead, 3 wounded in NAU campus shooting

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: 1 dead, 3 wounded in NAU campus shooting
text:
One person is dead and three are wounded after a shooting on the campus of Northern Arizona University early Friday morning, campus officials said. The wounded were taken to Flagstaff Medical Center. The suspected shooter is in NAU campus police custody.
Campus police responded to a call of shots fired at about 1:20 a.m. in the area outside of Mountain View Hall on the northeast end of campus.
NAU police and the Flagstaff Police Department are investigating at the scene.
A news conference is scheduled for 6 a.m.
12 News has crews in route and will have the latest as it becomes available.
